sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Heward is also a guardsman sworn to House Stark. He is killed by the same manner as in the show.
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 1]]===
Heward travels south with Lord [[Eddard Stark]] when the latter is appointed [[Hand of the King]]. He accompanies Lord Stark to one of [[Petyr Baelish]]'s brothels, and is killed by Lannister guardsmen on the orders of [[Ser]] [[Jaime]] .<ref>"[[The Wolf and the Lion]]"</ref>
